info.title: RiskIQ Illuminate
info.description: RiskIQ Illuminate reveals cyber threats relevant to your critical assets through connected digital relationships. It is the only security intelligence solution with tailored attack surface intelligence to uncover exposures, risks, and threats against your unique digital footprint, pinpointing what’s relevant to you—all in one place.

get.description: Retrieve current account metadata and settings.
Retrieve the details of API usage history of the account.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: History type (api/web), defaults to both

get.description: Finds the Attack Surface information of the given account.
Finds the Attack Surface Priority Information given the level (low, medium, high) associated to the given account.
get.summary: Get attack surface priority detail by level

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Priority level (high/medium/low)

get.description: Finds the Attack Surface Insight Information given the insight ID for the given account
get.summary: Get attack surface insight by insight Id

parameters.name: insightId
parameters.description: Insight Id

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description: The group by value (bar) to group by, based on the chart's groupBy field

parameters.name: segmentBy
parameters.description: The group by value (bar segment) to segment by, based on the chart's segmentBy field

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page to retrieve. The index is zero based so the first page is page 0

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of matching records to return per page
